Detailed Description

This file contains the ISR for the CAN-module of AT90CAN128/64/32.

This file contains functions for use with the CAN-module of AT90CAN128/64/32.

void CAN_set_dlc ( uint8_t  dlc  ) 

Sets DLC(Data Length Code) in CANCDMOB

Warning:
This function assumes that the right MOb is selected before
Parameters:
uint8_t dlc : The range of DLC is from 0 up to 8. If DLC field >8 then effective DLC=8.
Returns:
none

Definition at line 72 of file rob_can_private.c.

00073 {
00074   if(dlc > 8)
00075   {
00076      dlc = 8;
00077   }
00078    // delete old CANCDMOB
00079    CANCDMOB = 0x00;
00080    // write DLC (Data Length Code)
00081    CANCDMOB |= dlc;
00082 }

Definition at line 40 of file rob_can_private.c.

00041 {
00042    // only 11-bit IDs
00043       CANIDT4 = 0;
00044       CANIDT3 = 0;
00045       CANIDT2 = (uint8_t) id << 5;
00046       CANIDT1 = (uint16_t)id >> 3;
00047       
00048       // no IDE
00049       CANCDMOB &= (~(1<<IDE));
00050 }

00065    // only 11-bit IDs
00066    CANIDM4 = (1 << IDEMSK); //receive only standard frames
